attributes.action: Require part payment for NHS services which are received as a direct result of an unhealthy lifestyle.  Funds raised through this should be directly allocated to programmes that encourage healthy living.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Smoking, alcohol-abuse, and drug-abuse are examples of unnecessary burdens on our National Health Service.  Being aware of the possibility of having to pay for treatment as a result of unhealthy activities would provide an incentive for people to make the appropriate lifestyle changes where applicable.

The money raised could fund health initiatives that help people get over their dependencies before they cause themselves (and others) serious harm, as well as provide education about healthy living.
